title: Serbia Urban Escape in the Heart of Belgrade with Onsite Tapas Restaurant
description: Become immersed in a fascinating melting pot of cultures when you stay at Hotel Indigo Belgrade, an IHG Hotel, ideally located in the heart of the city. When you're not exploring some of Serbia's most popular sights such as Belgrade Fortress, the Temple of Saint Sava and Republic Square, spend time at your hotel and enjoy a refreshing drink under a string of fairy lights on the guest patio, or feast on mouthwatering Serbian tapas at onsite The Duke restaurant.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Belgrade, an IHG Hotel

title: Modern Belgrade City Break with Fine-Dining Serbian Restaurant
description: Belgrade's vibrant and thriving cityscape is yours to explore from your base at Crowne Plaza Belgrade, an IHG Hotel. This modern escape features an indoor swimming pool and Saruna Spa, the perfect spot to recharge with a fitness centre, sauna, steam bath and range of pampering spa treatments. When it's time for dinner, treat yourself to exquisite Serbian fine dining at Restaurant Prime - think mouthwatering grilled veal meatballs and dry-aged rib-eye steak.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Belgrade, an IHG Hotel
